elnsmwadapterui-form-url-help: This Adapter imports Protocols from ELN Experiments with structured experiment data. The prerequisite for this are corresponding protocol templates to these experiments in this Wiki.
elnsmwadapterui-error-service-offline: Service is currently offline. Please contact your administrator.
elnsmwadapterui-error-unsupported-eln: No ELN support configured for host: $1
elnsmwadapterui-warning-no-protocols: No protocols were created during import.
elnsmwadapterui-form-eln-type-help: Choose how you want to import protocols: via URL from supported systems or by uploading a file.
elnsmwadapterui-form-file-help: Upload a file containing experiment data.
elnsmwadapterui-error-file-not-found: Uploaded file could not be found.
elnsmwadapterui-card-url-description: Import experiment protocols directly from an ELN using the experiment URL.
elnsmwadapterui-card-excel-description: Upload a file containing experiment data to import protocols.
elnsmwadapterui-file-drop-text: Click to select file or drag and drop
